abstract: Citigroup‘s co-global head of technology, media and telecommunications investment banking is planning on leaving to join a fledgling private equity firm, The Wall Street Journal reported Thursday.
lead_paragraph: Citigroup‘s co-global head of technology, media and telecommunications investment banking is planning on leaving to join a fledgling private equity firm, The Wall Street Journal reported Thursday.

headline.main: Technology Investment Specialist at Citigroup Joining Buyout Firm
